type.bodyText: Select from the list of supported session types

project.bodyText: The project within which an image created

container_image.bodyText: The Docker image for the session.

session_name.bodyText: Name for the session. Alphanumeric and '-' characters only.

cores.bodyText: Number of cores used by the session.

repositoryUsername.bodyText: The username for authenticated access to the Image Repository.

repositorySecret.bodyText: The secret for authenticated access to the Image Repository.
